title: Dear Sir/ Mam I am using USA bought Google Pixel XL in India since 2017 and just 2 days before I faced a problem with my device as it is stuck in bootloop. It is rebooting again and again when G logo appears. I tried Hard Resetting the phone but it doesn't help. Please help me in this regard as I am not able to get it done or suggest me if I can re flash it online through Google Support Team. I will be highly thankful to you. Thanking you and looking forward for your quick response.
content: I have tried hard resetting the device to factory settings and it doesn't help...
